content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --USCHFL
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --USCHFL
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: Y
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.303
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: --USCHFL must be either Y or null
Outcome:
  Message: --USCHFL must be either Y or null
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '303'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The Unscheduled Flag (--USCHFL) variable is populated
                  when the timing of a performed test or observation was not driven
                  by the study schedule. | Expected values are Y or null.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: '4.2.9|6.2.1 '
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
      - EVENTS
      - INTERVENTIONS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: --USCHFL must be either Y or null

Outcome.Message: --USCHFL must be either Y or null

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The Unscheduled Flag (--USCHFL) variable is populated when the timing of a performed test or observation was not driven by the study schedule. | Expected values are Y or null.
